TopicTitle: Using a mining drill on asteroid without a claw?

Articles.Content:
Is that possible? Will my ship be attached to the asteroid? Or will i have to keep it in place with rcs?

Thank you!
You could nudge it with RCS but that just sounds too tedious to be worth it.
The drill does not attach itself to the asteroid. Drills don't do that, even in the real world. They have to be able to move.
